typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Western, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Was originally a veg restaurant but has added chicken and fish along with a full line of soy and gluten tacos, milanesas, enchiladas, tortas, various salads (menu on website). This is a smaller, newer branch that is closer to the center, a few minutes away from the main plazas. Limited (or no) English.
